game_physics

Class CoMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_physics.CoMesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionBox

    public class CoMesh
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollisionBox
    The class CoMesh represents the mesh type of CollisionBox. This is the most complex type of the collision box. Whit this type of box user gets most precisely collision detection, but collision check algorithm has very big time complexity.
    See Also:
    CollisionBox
